document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">A </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#08ffb8">word </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff04c4">left </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#08ffb8">careless </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">on </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff04c4">page </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">May </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#d06ccc">consecrate </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">an </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#08ffb8">eye, </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">When </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff04c4">folded </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">in </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#08ffb8">perpetual </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff04c4">seam </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">The </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#08ffb8">wrinkled </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff04c4">author </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#08ffb8">lie. </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: A word left careless on a page
